content: NEW YORK The stock of payment processing company Global Payments Inc could rise by 15 percent to $90 in the year ahead as revenue and profits increase  according to Barron's.
name: Global Payments Inc
title: Global Payments stock could rise 15 percent: Barron's

content: NEW YORK  Feb 26 The stock of payment processing company Global Payments Inc could rise by 15 percent to $90 in the year ahead as revenue and profits increase  according to Barron's.
name: Global Payments Inc
title: Global Payments stock could rise 15 percent -Barron's

content: U.S. payments processor Global Payments Inc  will buy smaller rival Heartland Payment Systems Inc  in a $4.3 billion cash-and-stock deal that will expand its merchant base and reach at a very competitive time in the industry.
name: Global Payments Inc
title: Payments processor Global Payments to buy rival Heartland for $4.3 billion

title: Global Payments to buy Heartland Payment Systems for $4.3 billion
